titles.title: A bill to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to pay interest to certain persons with respect to whom the Corporation is delinquent in making obligated payments.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 7/9/1987--Introduced. Amends the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to direct the Commodity Credit Corporation to pay interest to qualified persons on payments due them and made after the required payment date.
